lines.text: I can never go back, everyone that was close to me is dead.
So we finally found you Mr. Fukamachi. I would like you to accompany me to our base
I won't run anymore, pleas give Mizuky back to me.

That's good. If you appear in public as the guyver, our operatives in the police would be able to control you. Mizuky Segawa is being held at the old shipyards. Go ahead and try to rescue her you will be greeted by many of our zoanoids.

[he starts to glow green]
I know that, but I will go and rescue Mizuky. Not only for her, but for my friends Takaya and Mono, who you killed!
I will never for give you for this!
Stop kid don't come any closer!
[the barn explodes with him in it]
